metadata.synopsis: When a player from a class other than a paladin tries to speak with the Oathbtreaker Knight he will not want to start a conversation.From design: Any non-paladin character talking to the Oathbreaker receives no reply. The Oathbreaker looks up at the character, but shakes their head - they have no interest in you.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Start the game as a paladin.2. Become an oathbreaker (oe MakeOathbreaker with the paladin selected).3. End the day.4. End the next day too.5. Select a party member who is not a paladin and speak with the knight,OR1. oe CAMP_ForceOathbreakerKnight2. Go to camp. 3. Select a party member who is not a paladin and speak with the knight,

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The figure doesn't acknowledge your presence. They appear nothing more than an empty suit of armour.*

1.speaker: Narrator
